function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential for misuse of personal health data for discriminatory practices, including employment, insurance, and access to resources.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High transmission risk in densely populated cities impacting community well-being.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of smart city technologies due to lockdown and reduced city activity.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Civil-liberty concerns due to increased surveillance and personal data collection.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Questionable research practices in dutch institutes","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data sharing statements from covid-19 trials","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Researchers unwilling to share data leading to lack of transparency in clinical trials","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Academic focus on quantity of publications over quality and rigor of science","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accountability for poorly designed clinical trials and wasteful research","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promotion of open science without concrete efforts to improve research quality","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on preprints for public-health decisions without robust filtering","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Flawed or potentially fraudulent studies being used in meta-analyses to promote ivermectin as a wonder drug","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Preprints with impossible numbers and duplicate data circulating online without formal retraction","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significantly different impact of non-contact interaction on different types of service facilities","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The decrease in demand for physical commercial service facilities in the community life circle may lead to economic impact.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on non-contact transportation services may impact the use of public transport facilities and lead to overcrowding in alternative transportation modes.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased non-contact commercial activities in community life circles","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced use frequency of physical facilities","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consideration of non-contact commercial activities in the future","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in non-contact community administrative office services","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in habits and reliance on non-contact administrative services","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adjustment of community office facilities to integrate non-contact and physical services","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low utilization of non-contact elderly care services","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in community welfare facilities due to new elderly care model","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rise in non-contact interaction post-covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low usage of non-contact medical services","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited impact of online medical services","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Substitution effect on medical and health service allocation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased satisfaction with existing facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased frequency of using community facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on non-contact interaction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for community cultural and sports facilities in the 5-min community life circle","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased demand for community cultural and sports facilities in the 15-min and 10-min community life circles","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of non-contact interaction for cultural and sports activities during covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated adoption of non-contact teaching","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resident demand for community education facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High reliance on online teaching during covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Worries about the quality of online teaching","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprotected working hours of parents due to online teaching","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High reliance on online education during covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concerns about the quality of online teaching","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprotected working hours of parents due to online education","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of non-contact interaction activities during covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High frequency of use in medical and health facilities can increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low satisfaction with non-contact interaction activities may deter people from adopting virtual services and continuing to use traditional medical facilities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unwillingness to continue using non-contact services post-epidemic can hinder the development of virtual community spaces and impede disease containment efforts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the concept of 15-10-5-min community life circle","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mixed online and offline questionnaires leading to data inconsistencies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Field survey interviews potentially increasing exposure to contagious diseases","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using questionnaire survey and field research methods to gather first-hand information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
